TopicTitle: Sending messages (PM) to self for checking for mod updates

Articles.Content:
Tried this out and it actually works! It's useful for many things, but I use it to hold links to mods I use to easily check for updates. On my threads for my videos on YouTube I post links to the mods and that makes checking for updates real quick. I sent a message of links for all the Real Solar System mods I use and it's quite handy, especially when updating (or checking for updates, at least) that many mods at once. Try it!

Note that these links are shortened and do not link to the actual threads.

Example

AIES: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...rospace-v1-5-1

ALCOR: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...PD-11-02-2014)

SRB and PF KW Textures: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...dural-Fairings

DRE: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...y-Continued-v1

Engine Ignitor: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...ff-acc-Feb-12)

Hakari Engines: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...)-UPDATED-v1-2

BT Engines: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...gine-Pack-v1-3

ECLSS Life Support: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/58127

Module Manager: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...-1-5-6-(Jan-6)

Procedural Wings: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...dural-Wing-0-7

RasterPropMonitor: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...(v0-14)-24-Jan

RealEngines: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...l=1#post825469

Real Fuels: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64118

Realism Overhaul: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...or-RSS-1-10-14

Realism Pack: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60613

Real Solar System: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...3-fix-12-23-13

RPL Hotfix: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...-on-TreeLoader!)

StretchySRB: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57422

Visual Enhancements: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...ds-City-Lights

KerbX: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...X-analogue-mod

Kosmos: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...ated-(9-27-13)

kOS: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...lot-System-0-9

Edited March 8, 2014 by Woopert

All those links are broken, I'm afraid. Looks like you've tried to copy the list directly, but seeing as the link text is automatically shortened, you've not copied the actual links, just the shortened display versions of them (which point nowhere).

Ah, I see. This was just meant as an example anyways. I was just trying to show the potential usage of sending PM's to self.

Sorry about the broken links. When I read the PM myself the links do work.
